actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to deny the foreign tax credit and deduction for taxes paid in lieu of income taxes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the foreign tax credit and the deduction for taxes in lieu of income, war profits, or excess profits taxes imposed by a foreign country or U.S. possession.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to deny the foreign tax credit and deduction for taxes paid in lieu of income taxes.
